text: We did the book binding class. It was both fun and educational. Our teacher was AMAZING. We left knowing we could do it gain on our own because we now understood the purpose of each step. Absolutely amazing “vibe” — relaxed, friendly and accepting. We will go back for more classes. Also great fiber supplies — we bought some sashiko supplies and our teacher explained how to get started!

First time trying my hand at basic knitting and Hui Lian is such a patient soul throughout the duration of the workshop. The supply kits were beginner friendly and much thought were put into preparing them as well.  Thank you for the knowledge sharing and insights.

Have been learning weaving from them for several years and love their passion and dedication. They go the extra mile, giving their students the best advice in terms of techniques and tools (no upsell here ever!) and are patient and sincere in their approach. Thanks for being a great place for the local weaving community!
So many options for crafts and workshops.  Great teachers and tools
I popped in to get supplies and the owner patiently explained the different options in equipment and yarn to me. Great selection!
